label: 大勧進職
本: Land, Power, and the Sacred The Estate System in Medieval Japan . University of Hawai'i Press . 2018
著者: Goodwin, Janet R. (ed.)/ Piggott, Joan R. (ed.)
説明文: the Chief Alms Collector’s Office at Tōdaiji, which was responsible for soliciting donations for the rebuilding and repair of Tōdaiji structures and images
